TEXT.BODY: Shr 42 cts vs 1.53 dlrs Net 33,085,000 vs 123,450,000 Revs 535.0 mln vs 496.7 mln Avg shrs 78,755,000 vs 80,666,000 Nine mths Shr 1.24 dlrs vs 3.35 dlrs Net 98,322,000 vs 271,512,000 Revs 1.58 billion vs 1.49 billion Avg shrs 78,999,000 vs 81,022,000 NOTE: 1987 per-share earnings include Daily News severance charges of 11 cts a share in the quarter and 13 cts a share for the nine months 1986 net income includes non-recurring gains of 1.11 dlrs a share in the quarter and 2.23 dlrs a share in the nine months and five cts a share Daily News severance charges Reuter
